titleStmt.title: Beames of former light, discovering how evil it is to impose doubtfull and disputable formes or practises, upon ministers: especially under the penalty of ejection for non-conformity unto the same. As also something about catechizing.
titleStmt.author: Nye, Philip, 1596?-1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.I. for Adoniram Byfield, at the three Bibles in Cornhill, next door to Popes-head-Alley.,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Philip Nye by Wing.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "March. 1659"; the 60 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the three Bibles in Cornhill, next door to Popes-head-Alley.
